This is the first time I have ever given an interview to someone. Yes, interview, an argentinean journalist Ivan Adaime working for the local newspaper La Nacion mailed me. He asked me to give answers to some questions related to Google Total. Following are some of that questions
Why and when did you start with GoogleTotal?
 How many visits you get in one day?
Did someone from Google has contacted you?
 Do you really love Google? In what items do you think this company is different from others?

For those who do not know Google Total here is the link for it. Google Total has been quoted by many sites as "Better than the real Google"
